translations: n.破坏；设置炸药（demolitiond 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Despite some violations the pace of the demolitions seems to have slowed significantly over the last few years.
sentences.translation: 在过去的几年里，除去一些意外的情况，城市建筑的更替速度的确有了明显的减慢。

sentences.sentence: With time running out, a team of scientists turn to one man, demolitions expert John Redding, in effort to find a solution and secure the moon.
sentences.translation: 随着时间的流逝，一组科学家只剩下爆破专家约翰·雷丁一人，他在努力寻找解决办法并拯救月球。

sentences.sentence: The demolitions finally led to a confrontation on Friday, in which an employee of an advertisement company suffered a broken nose during a beating.
sentences.translation: 拆除最终导致了上周五的对抗，其中一个广告公司的雇员在殴斗期间被打断了鼻梁。
